title: Canada's air quality is in crisisâ€“your run can wait
content: A new report reveals that Canada's air quality is in crisis, with high levels of pollutants and toxins threatening the health of citizens. As runners, it's important to be aware of these risks and take steps to protect ourselves and our environment.

title: Boston Marathon 2025: Record-Breaking Registration Numbers
content: The Boston Athletic Association announced today that registration for the 2025 Boston Marathon has reached unprecedented levels, with over 30,000 qualified runners submitting their applications within the first 24 hours. The surge in interest follows last year's exceptional weather conditions and the introduction of new sustainability initiatives along the course.
